short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xiaohongshu material downloader: easily remove watermarks and download Xiaohongshu videos and pictures.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 小金薯 - 小红书素材下载器：轻松去水印下载小红书视频、图片。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SpudLite is a convenient and practical extension designed for Little Red Book users. Without complicated operations, easily download videos and images from Little Red Book, while removing watermarks, allowing you to enjoy the wonderful materials freely.

Features:
● Fast Download: One-click download of videos and images from Little Red Book, saving time.
● Remove Watermarks: Automatically remove watermarks from materials while retaining original clarity.
● Multiple Format Support: Supports downloading videos and images, meeting different needs.
● Simple and Easy to Use: Concise interface design, easy to use, no professional skills required.

How to use:
● This extension is only used in Xiaohongshu web pages.
● Open www.xiaohongshu.com.
● Click a note to enter the note details page, and then a download button will appear in the upper left corner of the note picture or video. Click to download.
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
小金薯是一款方便实用的浏览器插件，专为小红书用户设计。无需复杂操作，轻松下载小红书中的视频和图片，同时去除水印，让你尽情享受精彩素材。

功能特点：
● 快速下载：一键下载小红书中的视频和图片，节省时间。
● 去水印：自动去除素材中的水印，保留原始清晰度。
● 多格式支持：支持下载视频和图片，满足不同需求。
● 简单易用：简洁的界面设计，轻松上手，无需专业技能。

使用步骤：
● 此扩展仅在小红书网页中使用
● 打开www.xiaohongshu.com
● 点击一篇笔记进入笔记详情页，然后在笔记的图片左上角或者视频的左上角会出现下载按钮，点击即可下载

小金薯，为你的小红书体验增添更多乐趣！
